location: Um El Sid Cliff, Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: Dreams Beach Resort is an excellent choice for travellers visiting Sharm El Sheikh, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.Close to some of Sharm El Sheikh's most popular landmarks, such as The Heavenly Cathedral (1.7 mi) and Al Mustafa Mosque (1.8 mi), Dreams Beach Egypt is a great destination for tourists.Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free internet access offered by the resort.Dreams Beach Resort features a concierge and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and a poolside bar.While visiting Sharm El Sheikh, you may want to try some shrimp at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Fares Seafood, Little Buddha, or Fares Seafood - IL Mercato.Enjoy your stay in Sharm El Sheikh!

location: Soho Square, Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: Savoy Sharm El Sheikh is located near Ras Mohammed National Park inside SOHO SQUARE, the 5-star hotel offers 136 sea view rooms, 55 pool view rooms, 161 garden view rooms, 46 triple rooms, 2 special care rooms, 13 diplomatic suites, and 1 presidential suite. The hotel also features a private beach, 5 swimming pools 3 adult pools (2 heated in winter time) and 2 children's pools (1 heated in winter time) , 5 Bars (1 pool Bar) , and 6 restaurants Savoy hotel offers different types of meal plans that ensures you trying everything starting from the hotel’s main restaurant to Soho Square different restaurants and cuisines; standard Bed and breakfast, half board, full board, S-Class (ultra all-inclusive concept) , and half and full board dine around option (which SOHO Square restaurants as well) Diving or at least snorkeling with a PADI approved dive school on the beach. In the hotel we can find tennis, squash and beach volleyball courts as well as a modern gym facility . Sauna and Jacuzzis, as well as a range of beauty and spa treatments. Each room features adjustable air conditioning, WiFi access, mini-bar, en suite bathroom and hairdryer, and a private terrace overlooking our gardens , pools, or the beach.

location: Nabq Bay, Sharm El Sheikh 46628 Egypt
description: Rixos Premium Seagate is a beautiful ultra-all-inclusive 5-star deluxe resort by the splendid shores of the Red Sea. The resort comprises 1058 rooms, suites and villas fully equipped with mini-bar (water, soft drinks, beer, small bottle of wine & chocolates refilled on daily basis), bathrobes and slippers, LCD IPTV with international channels, free WiFi, direct dial phone, hairdryer, A/C, safe box , tea and coffee making facilities, balcony or terrace. The resort is stacked with 8 swimming pools, 7 A-la-carte restaurants along with an International main buffet restaurant, offering fresh juices for breakfast, all-inclusive bars serving imported alcohol and private beach cabanas with a butler service that anticipates guests every whim. The Resort is fully integrated to suit every type of activity embraced in the city of peace Sharm El Sheikh. Going all the way from a fully-equipped conference centre – Rixos Diamond Hall – coupled with a large conference room, breakout rooms and other business facilities to the latest Aquatic theme park in Sharm El Sheikh – Rixos Aquaventure – with a variety of dry and aqua games awaiting to entertain and delight every family member. Forms of amusement extend to cover the most delicate needs of all ages, from a specialized Kids Club with various activities and cheers in Rixy Club to keep them busy while their parents are enrolled in a nice relaxing massage at Sharm El Sheikh’s biggest recreational and wellness center, Anjana Spa, or attending one of the exceptional performances that take place regularly either on stage or among the roads of the resort.

description: 198 Superior Rooms, 290 Deluxe Rooms, 70 Family Rooms and 137 Junior Suites are spread around this beautifully designed modern resort. description: A luxury resort nestled into a headland peninsula. The accommodation comprises a series of two-level villas, set in landscaped grounds & water gardens. The hotel offers the independent-minded traveler a beautiful atmosphere, with 350 meters of beach frontage, overlooking Tiran Island; one of the world's best diving & snorkeling spots. The hotel'sprivate beach ensures direct access to the reef. The numerous spacious swimming pools & variety of outlets and relaxation areas guarantee guests to discover something wonderfully new at each & every time they stay so that no trip feels routine

location: El Fanar Street Hadaba, Sharm El Sheikh 1234 Egypt
description: Highlights: • Luxury resort with private beach and coral reef • Family friendly while keeping adults-only realms • Swim-up and Jacuzzi Rooms & Suites • 1 buffet and 5 à la carte restaurants (unlimited visits when booking all-inclusive) • Royal club privileges upon booking selected suites • Indian Ayurveda Spa availability Experience all the pleasures and luxuries of Sharm El Sheikh at SUNRISE Montemare Resort -Grand Select- a beautiful vacation spot overlooking the Gulf of Aqaba and Tiran Island. The 5-star luxury resort is family-friendly, however keeping its adults-only realms. The 282 rooms at SUNRISE Montemare Resort offer all the comfort and luxury you need for an unforgettable holiday at the Red Sea. Every room comes with satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. For guest seeking an extra outstanding experience, the resort offers swim-up rooms & suites, as well as sea view suites with private garden and pool. Experience culinary delights in the international restaurant with a daily changing theme buffet or dine at one of the 6 à-la-carte restaurants serving Asian, Italian, Egyptian, Steak and Diet & Light Cuisine. Delicacies from the sea can be enjoyed at Felucca Seafood restaurant (chargeable). In addition, the resort houses 7 Bars: 3 Pool Bars, Beach Bar, Sports Bar, Shisha Lounge, and a 24h Lobby Bar. As the first hotel chain in Egypt, SUNRISE Resorts & Cruises introduces Ayurveda treatments in SUNRISE Montemare Resort in Sharm El Sheikh. The introduction of the Ayurveda Spa with its highly selected and trained staff from India will make the Resort a new attraction for wellness, health and healing enthusiasts. With a spectacular beachfront and 4 outdoor pools, the Resort offers the perfect retreat. Located 10km (13 min) to Sharm El Sheikh Centre and 22km (21 min) to Sharm El Sheikh International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in Buffets or a la carte Restaurants (unlimited reservations), Snacks from 12:00-17:00, 22:30-01:00, local alcoholic Beverages from 10:00-00:00, Water and Hot Beverages 24/7, Minibar with water and soft drinks, Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge. Please get back to the hotel AI Formula for detailed information.

location: Naama Bay, Sharm El Sheikh 1839 Egypt
description: This luxurious 5-star full resort is located nearest to Naama Bay. Gourmet dining, expert diving lessons, and evening entertainment, all with stunning views of the Red Sea. The rooms at Stella di Mare Beach Hotel and Spa feature a contemporary design, and are fully modern with flat screen TVs. Each room includes a private balcony or terrace. Stella di Mare has a state-of-the-art PADI diving center and training facilities on-site. A lavish 600 square meter spa and Wellness Center offers guests full relaxation. Saunas, steam baths, indoor and outdoor Jacuzzi are available. Guests can swim in the Stella di Mare's grand outdoor pool, with panoramic views of the surrounding area. The Stella's acclaimed a la carte restaurants offer a variety of dishes from Mediterranean cuisine to Sushi, all prepared by a team of highly-trained international chefs. We also offer guests the chance to play golf on our fantastic short course. Guest's can play whilst enjoying spectacular views of the clear blue sea and can also benefit from our professional golf instructor. The Stella di Mare Beach Hotel and Spa also provides its own evening entertainment program, featuring local Egyptian belly-dancers and international singers nightly. The Resort is located just 10 km from Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport. Free parking is available on-site. Hotel Rooms: 298.

location: 30 Salah Taher St Ras Om El Sid Hill, Sharm El Sheikh 46619 Egypt
description: Highlights: • Luxurious Family Resort with aqua park • Private beach with access to coral reef • Swim-up and jacuzzi rooms • Stunning infinity pool • Adults only sanctuary • 1 buffet and 5 à la carte restaurants (unlimited visits when booking all-inclusive) • Royal club privileges upon booking selected suites Experience ultimate luxury and serenity at SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort -Grand Select- in Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt. The 5-star resort has been fully revamped and has been designed to offer guests a luxurious vacation beyond expectations. SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort comprises of 440 vastly spacious Rooms & Suites all of which exhibit a modern, state-of-the-art concept. Upgrade your vacation and enjoy your stay in any of the lavishly designed Swim-Up and Jacuzzi Rooms & Suites. Royal Club Privileges can be enjoyed when booking any of the Resort’s Suites. Every room comes with satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. This elegant resort offers a wide variety of culinary delights, including 1 international restaurant and 5 à-la-carte restaurants serving Italian, Egyptian, Indian, and Mongolian Cuisine and delicacies from the sea at Felucca Seafood restaurant (chargeable). With a total of 12 Bars, Cafés and Pubs, scattered through the Resorts’ premises you will enjoy a perfect mix of fun and relaxation. The newest addition is the Latitude Sky Bar promising spectacular views of the Red Sea. With a choice of three large heated outdoor swimming pools, along with a separate breathtaking infinity pool, and an Aqua Park that keeps the whole family splashing, enjoyment is guaranteed for everyone. Additionally, the Resort features a fully equipped gym (16+), and a high-end spa & beauty salon (chargeable). SUNRISE Diamond Beach Resort offers a private beach with access to a jetty, giving you direct access to the beautiful clear waters in which you can discover the wonders of the Red Sea’s coral reef. Located 15 km (10 min) to Sharm El Sheikh Centre and 25km (20 min) to Sharm El Sheikh International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, lunch and dinner in buffet or à-la-carte restaurants (unlimited reservations), snacks from 12:00-17:00, 23:00-01:00, local alcoholic beverages from 10:00-00:00, water and hot beverages 24/7, minibar with water & soft drinks, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. location: Om El Seid Hill, Sharm El Sheikh 2524 Egypt
description: Experience world-class service at Royal Grand Albatros Sharm - Adults Only Situated at the edge of the Om El Seid plateau in Sharm el-Sheikh, this 5-star beachfront hotel offers rooms with a private balcony. It features an outdoor pool and a private beach. The air-conditioned rooms at Royal Grand Albatros Sharm have satellite TV, a minibar, and an en suite bathroom. The rooms feature panoramic views of the pool, the landscaped gardens, or the Red Sea. Royal Grand Albatros Sharm offers on-site water sports, such as diving and snorkeling. Guests can get a relaxing massage at the spa, which also features a Turkish bath, a sauna, and a fitness center. Restaurant Mediterranean has a smart, casual atmosphere and its buffet-style menu offers local delicacies. Fresh salads and seafood specialties are served at the Gulf Stream, the poolside bar. Royal Grand Albatros Sharm is a 10-minute walk away from Il Mercato and Phantasia Land. Sharm el Sheikh’s center with its famous traditional bazaars is only a 15-minute drive from the hotel. Free private parking is available on site. Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.7 for a two-person trip.

We have a wide range of facilities including a 24hr bar serving drinks and snacks, a beautiful Panorama Terrace to capture the most amazing sunset views for those perfect kodak moments to save a lifetime of memories. We have many Swimming pools to meet everyone's tastes, have fun in the sun with the family's at the leisure pool or relax reading a book chilling by our adults pool at the Relax we have it for all ages. Teens hangout room including play stations, games machines, air hockey and billiards or join in the activities with the Animation Team. Treat your self with one of our Royal Tents with complete privacy, waiter service, direct access to the sea for relax time including drinks, fruit for a small additional charge or lounge on your sun bed at the beach at your leisure with 350 m of sand and try our snorkeling from the jetty to spot little Nemo with a trained instructor the choice is yours. If you would like to make your stay extra special we have many other room types to upgrade, our Honeymoon Suite being the most popular choice and highest category. This option is by far the best choice and we can guarantee you won't be disappointed, pure luxury with direct sea view, the moon the stars the sunset all in one. Your very on private double jacuzzi, separate living room, walk in wardrobe, marble bathroom, DVD player with surround sound and wifi with many other benefits included. All for a small supplement. Easy access to the other resort areas to visit during your stay by taxi or shuttle you will be anywhere in a short time to grab your bargains shop till you drop or chill in one of the famous shisha cafes we can direct you. Upload your memorable photos on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram whilst enjoying your holiday with our new extended wifi or Skype your friends at home to show them the wonderful Hotel your staying in now available in various areas of the Hotel free of charge. If you fell active during your stay why not try a discover scuba dive or complete your padi and become a certified diver with our very own dive centre on the beach or get active in our amazing gym and learn all the exercises with a trained and qualified fitness instructor ,. If you prefer to pamper your self relax in our steam room or sauna free of charge. Don't forget to reserve your Ala Carte Restaurants with our Guest Relation Team who are available in the lobby to make your dining experience the most enjoyable one, sample our tasty delicious 4. Course meal with complete tranquility in our La Romantique Restaurant special offers apply. We are truly confident by choosing the Reef Oasis Blue Bay Resort and Spa you will not be disappointed. If you have any further questions or queries we would love to hear from you. We look forward to welcoming our Guests soon. Management.

location: 86 Pyramisa Road Behind Conference Center, Sharm El Sheikh 46619 Egypt
description: Highlights: • Luxury resort with private beach and coral reef • 6 pools and 2 Jacuzzis • 2 buffet and 7 high à la carte restaurants (unlimited visits when booking all-inclusive) • Royal club privileges upon booking selected suites • Royal Villa availability Discover the spirit of Arabian ambiance in the 5-star luxury SUNRISE Arabian Beach Resort -Grand Select-. Walk through entrances and hallways elegantly designed to provide an authentic Arabian feel. Gaze upon the beauty of the exterior, complementing the natural beauty of the Red Sea. Relax at one of the rooms on this six-terraced architectural beauty and enjoy all the luxuries we have to offer, including pools and a rooftop garden. We offer a private beach with access to a jetty giving you direct access to the beautiful clear waters in which you can discover the wonders of the Red Sea from our coral reef. This elegant resort features a fully equipped gym (16+), and a luxury spa & beauty salon (chargeable). Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. Relax at one of the 421 rooms & suites at the stunning resort. Every room comes with satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. For guest seeking an extra outstanding experience, SUNRISE Arabian Beach resort offers sea view suites, that can come with a small garden or pool area and royal club privileges. Enjoy all the luxuries the resort has to offer, including 7 pools and a rooftop garden. Experience culinary delights in the international restaurant with a daily changing theme buffet or dine at one of the 7 à-la-carte restaurants serving Indian, Greek, Thai, Mongolian, Italian, French Cuisine, and delicacies from the sea at Felucca Seafood restaurant (chargeable). In addition, the resort houses 8 Bars: Pool Bar, Beach Bar, Waterfall Grill Bar, Shisha Café, a Pub, 2 Lounges and a 24h Lobby Bar. SUNRISE Kid’s Club led by professional care takers is available for kids between 3-12 years old offering Daily Educational, Entertaining Sports & Activities. Located 12km (16 min) to Sharm El Sheikh Centre and 8km (9 min) to Sharm El Sheikh International Airport, the resort features a distinctive location. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in Buffets or a la carte Restaurants (unlimited reservations), Snacks from 12:00-17:00, 22:30-01:00, local alcoholic Beverages from 10:00-00:00, Water and Hot Beverages 24/7, Minibar with water and soft drinks, Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge. Please get back to the hotel AI Formula for detailed information.

description: IL Mercato is an exclusive five stars city hotel located in Hadaba area, right in the center of IL Mercato Promenade which is home to some of the biggest International brands. With 318 spacious and elegantly furnished guest rooms, large Spa with sauna, massage rooms and Jacuzzi, fitness center and four luxurious swimming pools, fine dining including one main restaurant, one à la carte restaurant, lobby bar and snack bar it provides all the necessary facilities for the most comfortable and enjoyable vacation. description: Party all night and relax all day as you take in the stunning vistas of the lovely Nabq Bay, just 10 minutes away from Sharm El-Sheikh International Airport. description: One of the finest resorts on the Red Sea; The multiple Award winning, certified Eco Friendly, Sultan Gardens Resort in Sharm el Sheikh is your ideal All Inclusive holiday destination in Southern Sinai. The resort boasts 220 meters of private sandy beaches, beautiful coral formations, and an unrivaled view of the stunning Tiran Island. The resort also features five large, freshwater swimming pools as well 550 guest rooms ranging from the comfortable and spacious Standard rooms, to the luxurious Premium rooms and suites feasting in room Jacuzzis, all the way to the ultimate option of holidaying in your own private beachfront villa. The Sultan Gardens Resort is not just about great rooms, gorgeous pools and an unbeatable location. Everyone involved in Sultan Gardens Resort’s success is a firm believer that dining is an integral part of any holiday and recognizes the importance of offering delicious, exciting food coupled with inspired service. Guests will be impressed with the wealth of choice on offer whether they are dining in one of our six award winning themed restaurants, enjoying themselves at one of our 9 bars, or taking advantage of 24 hour room service.

location: 1 Four Seasons Boulevard Sinai Peninsula, Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: A rare desert-and-sea sanctuary. An intimate Arabian village, with Moorish-inspired architecture, rooftop domes, arched doorways and fountain courtyards the Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh enchants guests with feelings of serenity and authenticity. Reminiscent of a hillside oasis with one- and two-storey villas, the Resort offers a multitude of walkways, breathtaking view spots, elegant swimming and recreational areas, private settings for reflection or gatherings. All facing the shimmering waters of Red Sea. On the other side, the lush greenery of Resort’s grounds stand in contrast to the stark beauty of the desert and mountaintops backdrop. All Resort’s outlets take full advantage of the vistas, offering choice of indoors and al fresco dining. A range of enclosed and outdoor function spaces provide creative options for staging meetings or social receptions. Crystal-clear blue sea is teaming with natural wonders, the Resort is part of protected marine park area, attracting diving connoisseurs and snorkeling lovers from all over the world. The consistently warm, intuitive Four Seasons service DNA permeates every detail of Resort’s life. Every staff member wholeheartedly engaged in seamless delivery of unmatched experiences to leisure and business guests alike.

description: See why so many travellers make Dreams Vacation Resort their resort of choice when visiting Sharm El Sheikh. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travellers like you.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as The Heavenly Cathedral (1.4 mi) and Al Mustafa Mosque (1.5 mi), guests of Dreams Vacation Resort can easily experience some of Sharm El Sheikh's most well known attractions.Dreams Vacation Hotel is a family-friendly resort offering air conditioning and a minibar in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as internet access is offered to guests.The resort features room service and a concierge. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travellers visiting Sharm El Sheikh.When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Little Buddha, Rangoli, and Tandoori, which are some Asian restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.Best of all, Dreams Vacation Resort makes it easy to experience some great Sharm El Sheikh attractions like King Tut Museum, which is a popular history museum.At Dreams Vacation Resort, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Sharm El Sheikh.

location: Marine Sporting Club Road Hadabet Om El Sied, Sharm El Sheikh 46619 Egypt
description: SENTIDO Reef Oasis Senses Resort is a classic Red Sea hotel, with a choice of bars and restaurants. The hotel is finished with touches of traditional Egyptian design, and enjoys views of the sea and surrounding landscape. During your stay, you have the bustling resort of Naama Bay a short drive away, where you'll find entertainment, shopping and amusement parks. The Resort is on the beach, but if you'd prefer to cool off in a pool, the hotel has 15 to choose from. There's also a separate pool for children and a water slide. You'll find many shady spots among the palm trees around the hotel, or you can head to the pool bar for a chilled cocktail. There are three bars in total, as well as three restaurants within the hotel. There's Wi-Fi access in all public areas. If you're looking for relaxation, the hotel has a spa which offers treatments. You could also spend some time in the hotel gym, or hire the tennis courts for a leisurely match. After dinner, there's also evening entertainment

description: 'The hotel occupies a prime location right in the centre of Sharm el Sheikh on Naama Bay’s promenade and sandy beaches of the Red Sea, offering 392 rooms including 23 suites, in 42 bungalows. All rooms are equipped with balcony or terrace, bathroom/WC, hairdryer, climate control, minibar, safe, telephone and Satellite TV. The cosy standard rooms are located in the Sport Area, which is around 300 meters from the main building and 700 meters from the beach. The comfort rooms are situated at the Palm Area, located beside the main reception area. 50 to 500 meters from the beach is the Preferred Front Area where the elegant superior rooms are situated. Gastronomic facilities feature 9 restaurants and bars covering a broad spectrum of international cuisine including 4 à-la-carte restaurants (thereunder a French and an Italian one) and the famous Beach BBQ. 24-hour room service is provided. The hotel’s expansive grounds and sports facilities ensure active guests have plenty to do. Newly built Thai Spa and wellness center, 4 tennis courts, children club, SUBEX diving centre, parasailing, various water sports, volleyball, horse/camel riding, safaris, jeep, quad and boat trips are offered. The Maritim Jolie Ville golf course is approx. 7 km from the hotel. Two pools (one with seawater and one with freshwater) are amidst the landscaped gardens. Kids will enjoy their time in the holiday club, open the whole year through for children from 4 to 12 years. Bakery, shops, bank, limousine service and a doctor in house are also offered. Maritim Jolie Ville Resort & Casino occupies a conference center, built on 3.000 m² of land, consisting of 7 meeting rooms, the biggest of which can accommodate up to 500 persons. All meeting rooms are equipped with the latest technology. Besides, the “Casino Royale” is operated by Casinos Austria International and located opposite the hotel. Business hours of reception: 24/7

location: Ras Nasrani Bay, Sharm El Sheikh 46619 Egypt
description: Highlights: • Beachfront resort with private sandy beach • One of the best coral reef at Ras Nasrani • Access to 8 à la carte restaurants (unlimited visits) • Family friendly rooms & availability of jacuzzi suites Situated in front of the famous island of Tiran, SUNRISE Remal Beach Resort has an incredibly picturesque landscape. The resort comprises of 197 spacious rooms & suites with stunning sea views. Every room comes with satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Enjoy all the luxuries the resort has to offer, including 5 pools and a private sandy beach with house reef for diving and snorkel enthusiasts. Experience culinary delights in the international restaurant with a daily changing theme buffet or dine at one of the 8 renovated à-la-carte restaurants serving Steak, Egyptian, Mexican, Mediterranean, Indian & Thai cuisine. For seafood lovers, the Resort hosts a Seafood à-la-carte restaurant (chargeable). In addition, the resort houses 3 pool bars, beach bar, Shisha café and a 24h Lobby Bar. The SUNRISE Kid’s Club led by professional care takers is available for kids between 3-12 years old offering Daily Educational, Entertaining Sports & Activities. Located 10 minutes from Neama Bay City Centre and Sharm El Sheikh International Airport, the hotel offers the perfect balance between desert privacy and exploring the city’s nightlife. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in Buffets or a la carte Restaurants (unlimited reservations), Snacks from 12:00-17:00, 22:30-01:00, local alcoholic Beverages from 10:00-00:00, Water and Hot Beverages 24/7, Minibar with water and soft drinks, Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge. Please get back to the hotel’s AI Formula for detailed information.

description: "Amarsina is an authentic Egyptian village, one of which a visitor would feel home. Within its genuine architecture, one can find some of the best inherited methods of construction in Egyptian heritage. Some Green Architecture principles was applied fifteen years ago during the construction of the village. So, as you walk through its two-hundred year old wooden door towards the lobby, you slowly start to discover the essence of the place. The handmade-brick decorated domes, colored marble floors, inner courtyard where the main swimming pool is located, village’s backyard farm with its iconic Pharonic statues, walkways, paths and corridors. We bring Egypt on a silver plate right to your grip.”

description: IL Mercato is an exclusive five stars city hotel located in Hadaba area, right in the center of IL Mercato Promenade which is home to some of the biggest International brands. With 318 spacious and elegantly furnished guest rooms, large Spa with sauna, massage rooms and Jacuzzi, fitness center and four luxurious swimming pools, fine dining including one main restaurant, one à la carte restaurant, lobby bar and snack bar it provides all the necessary facilities for the most comfortable and enjoyable vacation. location: Sharks Bay P.O.Box:296, Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: Located on the idyllic shores of Sharm El Sheikh, a truly inspiring seaside destination, the 5 star hotel has its own 450 meters stretch of private beach, a stunning pool surrounded by a lush tropical landscape with over 2000 palm trees. Sharm El Sheikh is now one of the world’s most accessible resort destinations for snorkeling and scuba diving. The luxury beachfront resort is 8 Km away from Sharm El Sheikh International airport and 2 minutes from Sharm El Sheikh International congress center as well as the center of Na'ama bay with easy access to the many tourist attractions of the region. The Resort offers 526 luxurious rooms, suites and Club Rotana Executive rooms and suites in addition to 9 Royal villas with four & five bedrooms with private swimming pools. All luxury hotel guest rooms and suites feature a private balcony or terrace overlooking Tiran Island or the gardens. For dining and entertainment, the resort offers seven restaurants, bars and cafe’s catering to every taste expertly blended with the highly acclaimed award winning Rotana standards. Keep up with your fitness routine while you're away from home. The Bodylines Wellness & Fitness Club at Grand Rotana Resort & Spa Sharm El Sheikh features state-of-the-art fitness equipment and our award-winning Zen the spa at Rotana offers you tranquility and pure relaxation to balance your mind, body and soul. The Scorpions Dive Club is our 5* PADI center for diving and Snorkeling within easy reach in the resort.

location: Namaa Bay, Sharm El Sheikh 46628 Egypt
description: Lido Sharm Hotel is a charming and intimate boutique style hotel directly facing the Red Sea water on Naama Bay, and in front of the plateau of Om El Sid hill. It is only two minutes walk from Naama Bay center and the heart of Sharm El-Sheikh City and only 11 km from the airport. Looking out from the roof of the hotel is like standing on the prow of an ocean liner as she reaches out for the sea. This stunning vista over Naama Bay is matched by a beautiful landscape, a clean sandy beach and a friendly, convivial and intimate atmosphere. Hotel facilities include exquisite restaurants and bars we have a pool and beach bar and La Folie Terrace Bar. As well as a range of leisure activities. Full reception facilities are supported by a 24-hour concierge service and Internet access in the lobby. Diving and snorkelling experince would not have easier with thier "Blue Ocean - Dive Club" diving center taking the advantage of being next to the mian boats jetty of Naama Bay. After a long day snorkeling just experiencing the bustle of downtown Sharm, take a refreshing dip in the pool before retiring to your room. Room Service is 24/7, and medical assistance is available on request.

description: Parrotel Beach Resort, Sharm El Sheikh formerly known as Radisson Blu, Sharm El Sheikh offers upscale lodging on the coast of the Sinai Peninsula. Guests can snorkel off nearby Tiran Island or take a shuttle to the city center. As an added convenience, Sharm El Sheikh International Airport is only 7 kilometers away. The 331 rooms and suites boast features like a mini bar and views of the sea or garden. A total of 4 on-site restaurants give travelers plenty of dining choices. Some popular options include Mediterranean fare, homemade Italian dishes and fresh seafood. You can visit poolside and beach bars or enjoy a cocktail away from the sun. The spa offers both a gym and relaxing massages. Experience the region’s aquatic life and beautiful coral with our diving center. Ideal for business or personal galas, the expansive King Tut Ballroom can host up to 225 people. Event organizers can also use the garden and terrace for smaller gatherings.

location: RasNosrani, Sharm El Sheikh 46619 Egypt
description: Sensatori Sharm El-Sheikh Resort puts you just footsteps from the sand. It is set on a beach overlooking Ras Nosrani Bay across 37 scenic acres of landscaped gardens fronting a stretch of over 600 meters of pristine sandy beaches. Sensatori Sharm El-Sheikh Resort is located across Tiran Island and close to the world-famous Ras Mohammed National Park, both considered to be two of the best diving spots in the world. The resort is also conveniently situated near Sharm El Sheikh Airport, the city centre, marina and the various attractions in and around Sharm El Sheikh. BALANCE and CHOICE, running through the whole Sensatori experience. On the one hand there are action-packed activities; on the other, ultra-relaxing spa treatments. Likewise, gourmet cuisine sits alongside fast food. The secret to it all and the main focus lies in the attention to details. The hotel offers 470 guest rooms and suites categorized to 19 room/suite types, all dressed in modern stylish fixtures and furniture. All rooms are equipped with electronic key lock, 32” LCD television and 40” in suites, mini bar, safe box, iPod docking station, iron/ironing board, tea and coffee kettle and a luxury bathroom with a Jacuzzi bathtub and mood light.

name: Charmillion Gardens Aqua Park
aminities: ,Free parking,Free internet,Pool,Fitness Centre with Gym / Workout Room,Free breakfast,Beach,Diving,Kids stay free,Public wifi,Paid internet,Pool / beach towels,Outdoor pool,Fitness / spa changing rooms,Fitness classes,Bar / lounge,Restaurant,Breakfast buffet,Poolside bar,Tennis court,Aerobics,Darts,Entertainment staff,Evening entertainment,Table tennis,Nightclub / DJ,Babysitting,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Kids club,Kids' outdoor play equipment,Airport transportation,Shuttle bus service,Taxi service,Business Centre with Internet Access,Banquet room,Meeting rooms,Spa,Facial treatments,Hammam,Massage,Salon,24-hour security,Baggage storage,Concierge,Gift shop,Shops,Sun loungers / beach chairs,Sun umbrellas,24-hour front desk,Dry cleaning,Laundry service,Air conditioning,Private balcony,Room service,Safe,Refrigerator,Flatscreen TV,Ocean view,Non-smoking rooms,Suites,Family rooms,Smoking rooms available
location: Qesm Sharm Ash Sheikh, Nabq Bay, Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: Went there as a part of family trip- mom, brother, SIL, 2 kids. We were promised wifi and I paid for a certain level of accomodations.  Instead they only had wifi in the lobbies (you can only check in and out in one, the rest are purely decorative and for saying "go to the main lobby"), but in the rooms there was none, and I had to buy a local sim in the hotel store. The owner of the shop sold 2 sims- to me and my brother, one of them didn't work, but the owner didn't admit to a thing.  Door was constantly getting stuck and the sink drain didn't work. Sink was fixed on the same day, the door- on day 4.   Cleaning: they mop the floor, but don't change the sheets- the staff just turned them over. I know because it was the same stain.   Food: Acceptable. Not wow, acceptable. Some plates and cups were chipped and cutlery was filthy.  On day 3 we were offered a compensation dinner in one of the a-la-carte restauraunts. I was told it was for the repairs. When I was offered to sign a waver, I saw that it was for a DOWNGRADE of the room I was NOT notified of. Too bad I read what I sign.   But I'm the forgiving type. So I decided to pretend it's acceptable. We went to the dinner- and 2 out our party of 6 got food poisoning.  Mosquitoes. But no nets or zappers. And no spraying or any other measures taken. Luckily I brought repellent from home.   Kids club- another promised feature. About 3 square meters and no AC in airtight room. Saunas aren't safe in this age, just so you know.   The airport is nearby. Either the windows are shut completely, or you don't sleep that night.   On the bright side, the garden is lovely, the beach is clean and the aquapark is perfect- clean, well staffed, safe.   In summary: lots of things to improve, but I guess it could be worse...…

aminities: ,Free parking,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Pool,Fitness Centre with Gym / Workout Room,Free breakfast,Entertainment staff,Evening entertainment,Babysitting,Outdoor pool,Bar / lounge,Restaurant,Breakfast buffet,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Kids club,Airport transportation,Shuttle bus service,Business Centre with Internet Access,Meeting rooms,Hammam,Concierge,Sun umbrellas,Dry cleaning,Laundry service,Air conditioning,Safe,Seating area,Non-smoking rooms,Suites
location: EL Sheikh Zayed Street, Nabq Bay, Sharm El Sheikh 46921 Egypt
description: We have stayed in this hotel for 8 nights and arrived on the last day of the Climate Change Summit 2022. And we could feel the difference after all Summit guests were gone.   What was fabulous during our stay: animation team! They were really a highlight duringour stay! We have celebrated a birthday of my 4 year old daughter during our stay and animation team and russian speaking manager of the hotel done a really great job to make us feel festive! They have decorated our room as a piece of art, baked the cake, brought it to our room and in the evening after the mini disco the Event manager made a great little happy birthday party for our daughter! Couldnt celebrate better than that and I would say million thanks to Amira, Margarita, Ahmed and other animators for being so warm, welcoming and nice to us!! We will remember this day! Thank you thank you thank you! you've done a really great job! The fire show was also a blast!! Mini disco every day at 20.30 folowing some sort of show for adults like fire show or belly dance.   Beach was nice and The sea is beautiful! This is definately a must see! The shuttle from the hotel goes every hour but you can walk about 15 mins to the beach yourself to get some excercise. We've done that every day. The path is easy but lots of rubbish in the area. I wonder why the hotels dont make their staff to clean not only inside of the hotel but also around it. Animation team could come to the beach more often to spend some time with guests doing zumba and playing volleyball. We have seen them only once for 1 day and they said there were not enough animators.  The Restaurant. First few days was fab. After that it was a mess. Salty soup for 3 days, salty fish. This was a first time for me when I refuse to eat food in the restaurant. An improvement on the menu is needed. Loads of greens though, many fruits including fresh figs, strawberries, guavas, grape, apples, delicious dry plums, etc - this is a 5*. Food in first few days was amazing! Fresh grill outside, inside so many choices of food and everythng we've tried was delicious. After summit guests were gone there was no more vegetarian options. We had a 1 day dinner in the small Italian restaurant where the buffet was transfered due to a little amount of guetsts in the hotel and were offered to choose the main meal while the rest was in a buffet style. This was a disaster. So salty grilled fish and soup.. left hungry. The next day there was no food in the beach cafe. And we stayed hungry until the evening. And again salty soup in the evening.. Morning pancakes and waffles recepie needs improvement. Not tasty and cold, had to ask to make fresh for me every time but still took ages and was too dry due to the grill not heated enough and it took long time for panckaes to cook. Eggs and omelets were fab! Cereals sections needs no sugar addition like sugar free muesli. Music in the dining area is disturbing therefore we were eating outside the restaurant all the time. Beach cafe needs improvement as well. As they do french fries and chicken in advance, everything gets cold and this is served to the guestes. Evrything has to be made fresh including french fries. Staff over there doesn't do any other job than that. They just stare at the phones all the time and serve cold potatoes. Fruits are there thannks for that. First aid needs to be completed with scissors (they dont have them and plaster has been cut by the safe guard).   Staff is very friendly and helpful - this is a highlight. I've had a help wherever i go. But  they do require a bit more knowledge of english. And the guy that sells excursions in the hotel is very friendly (thank you) but super annoying.  Room was awesome! huge and bed, pillows were very comfy. View from the balcony was on the pool and mountains. Amazing! Everything you could possibly need is there: bottle of water for every person, coffee station, kettle, plenty of fresh towels. Cleaned every day.  Music from the pool area in the morning was amazing. Loved it! Quiet and peaceful. The 2 minus: staff needs training on how to wash floors - not good. And our hot water was yellow colour.…

description: The Luxury 5-star Tamra Beach Resort is ideal for single travelers, couples and families looking to avoid long airport transfers and for somewhere they can relax and have everything catered for without the need to leave the resort. Tamra Beach resort is in the Nabq Bay area and on the beach front only a 10-minute drive from Sharm el Sheikh International Airport. It also offers 24-hour front desk service. The Resort is mainly an Italian Club, but welcomes other nationalities. The resort is located next to Nabq National park which is known for its colourful marine life and its extraordinary Mangrove colonies. description: Nothing wrong with the food.  Plenty of choice.  If you want chicken nuggets, go to Spain.  Accommodation is a little tired but is clean.  Air con fab.     The staff are brilliant.  Ashram, the best barman and Eslam around the pool.  Nothing is too much trouble.  All the restaurant staff.  We can't thank you all enough.  If you do experience the upset tummy., it is the heat NOT the food.    Lots of love to all the staff and to Cucko the kissing parrot.  Only thing, August is ridiculously hot so I would go back at a different time of year.

location: 7 Km North Of Sharm Airport, Nabq Bay, Sharm El Sheikh 1111 Egypt
description: Comfortable 4* hotel was designed for those who love the sea, sun and fun together. Cozy and intimate, with a complex of fancy shaped pools, it is perfect for a family holiday. The hotel offers an interesting entertainment program from morning till the very evening with lots of attractions. Care about our youngest visitors is our priority! Water slides and playgrounds - a paradise for children. And for sure a lot of new international friends will be a nice special bonus. Great place to enjoy various evening shows and late dinner and all the refreshments throughout the day. Rooms : The hotel has a total number of 663 rooms of different types: * Standard - 25-29 m² - comfortable room * Superior - 28-30 m² - comfortable room of a larger size * Family -30-35 m² - one large room * Executive - 30-35 m² - luxury room * Suite - 45-60 m² - luxury 2-rooms apartment Each room is equipped with individually controlled air conditioning, private bathroom with shower or bath, television, telephone, safe box. Balcony or terrace with a beautiful view of the garden, which is well taken care of, palm trees and swimming pools can be found in every room. Two outside playgrounds will help parents to enjoy all the leisure activities together with their children not only in the Kids Club but on the beach as well. And for sure everybody are welcome for the most important part of the program - Mini - Disco! ENTERTAINMENT: Every day various classes with an international animation team (yoga, dance lessons, water volleyball, etc..) are provided all over the territory of hotel. Our evening shows held in the Old Egyptian Amphitheater will take you to the fairy-tale of Arabic night. Fakir show, belly dancers, Egyptian art, derwish show will create the spirit of ancient magic . And our live singer, violin performances and dance competition will help you to discover your hidden talents. The hotel's aqua-park consists of 12 different shaped swimming pools with area of 6,000 m² in total, large and small for children, with water slides for everybody. Some of them , including the Main one, are heated in winter. Our international animation team offers different opportunities to train not only sense of humor but body as well. Everyday you can enjoy and have a lot of fun with: * GYM and fitness * Tennis courts * Table tennis competition * Volleyball tournament * Darts * Water Polo * Aqua-aerobics * Belly-dance and Latino -dance lessons. Rehana 24 Hours All Inclusive: * 24 hours food & beverages service in all of our 25 outlets (restaurants , bars ,snack corners) * Three main buffet meals (breakfast, lunch and dinner ) & Kids' corner * Four a la carte restaurants (Italian, Mexican, Indian and Lebanese) * Early breakfast, late breakfast, snacks, tea time and late dinner * Snack Beach bar (beverages) *Food Court with full amenities * Entertainment (daily animation program, night shows ) * Sports (mini football, basketball tennis courts, table tennis, GYM, water polo, aerobics , dances lessons, darts,..)* Rehana Ultra All Inclusive: * Enjoy the 24 hours formula PLUS: * 24 hours All inclusive food & beverages * Three additional visits to a la carte restaurants (Asian and Oriental in Rehana Royal Beach and Seafood restaurant on the beach) * Mini bar upon arrival & 2 bottles of water daily * Fresh fruit platter upon arrival * Laundry service (once per stay) * Sports (mini football, table tennis , tennis court during the day & in night time free of charge) * Turn down service * Free Internet daily * Rehana souvenirs

location: Om El Seid Hill Hadaba - IL Mercato, Sharm El Sheikh 46619 Egypt
description: IL Mercato is an exclusive five stars city hotel located in Hadaba area, right in the center of IL Mercato Promenade which is home to some of the biggest International brands. With 318 spacious and elegantly furnished guest rooms, large Spa with sauna, massage rooms and Jacuzzi, fitness center and four luxurious swimming pools, fine dining including one main restaurant, one à la carte restaurant, lobby bar and snack bar it provides all the necessary facilities for the most comfortable and enjoyable vacation. La Piazza, in the center of IL Mercato, is the place to meet or take in festivals, concerts and carnivals. Hotel provides free shuttle bus to the most famous beaches from sandy (Terrazzina Beach, White Beach) to open sea beaches ideal for snorkeling & diving experience of the Red Sea (Fanar Beach, Reef Beach, Palma Beach). There is a doctor service available 24 hour, laundry service, Limo Service, Meeting rooms and business services are also available.

location: Dusti Road, Sharm El Sheikh 99996 Egypt
description: So bad. Saw several cockroaches in the room and everything was dirty. The property smelled like sewage. I complained to the staff and they offered to put us in a room next door just as bad. I decided to stick with the original room because by that point, I did my best to clean sanitize the room and make sure the cockroaches wouldn’t infiltrate our bed or luggage. There is no reception on site. The security guard calls someone when you arrive. It’s really weird. They said that they would give my tour guide a refund and then because we didn’t change rooms they refused. So we ended up having to pay even though we had such a horrible experience.  We were ready to leave on the spot but couldn’t find another place to stay because we arrived so late. Do yourself a favor and read the reviews on booking.com. They may seem funny, but they are all very accurate. I’m not sure why most people made negative comments, but then gave a high rating. It makes no sense to me. I’ve stayed in hundreds of hotels over the years, and this was by far the worst.…

location: Magles El Madina St. Hadabet Umm El Sid, Sharm El Sheikh 2222 Egypt
description: Description: In Ras Om Sid, half a mile from the Old Market, Aida offers spacious rooms with balconies and free Wi-Fi. Overlooking Sharm El Maya, it features an outdoor pool. Aida Hotel’s air-conditioned rooms are traditionally decorated with wood furniture. Each room has a TV and a minibar. A breakfast buffet is offered daily in the hotel’s main restaurant. The Panorama Restaurant has a view of El Maya Bay and serves dinner. Lunch, light snacks and drinks can also be enjoyed around the pool. Guests can choose from a variety of sports, including basketball, racquetball, tennis, and diving. They can also visit the fitness center, the sauna or enjoy massage treatments. Al Marcato, bars and restaurants are within a 2 minute walk of Aida Resort. Sharm El Sheikh Airport is 12 miles away, and a car rental service is also available.

description: Superbly situated at the beach at the quieter end of Na'ama bay Oonas Dive Club's spacious, air-conditioned, and comfortably furnished accommodation offers a choice of suites, single and double rooms, with some of the most spectacular panoramic views of Na'ama Bay and the back drop of the Sinai Mountains. With bar and restaurant facilities on site, free wifi and only a short walk to the main centre with all its attractions, Oonas is an ideal hotel for those seeking personal service and a relaxed sociable atmosphere. Our PADI Dive Centre provides an extremely popular choice for groups, individuals, children and families who seek a friendly, informal and professional environment in which to experience the best the Red Sea has to offer. Sharm El Sheikh Airport is only a 20 minute drive away and an airport meet and greet transfer service can be provided at a reasonable cost.

location: Centre of Na'ama Bay, Sharm El Sheikh 46619 Egypt
description: Our small and friendly boutique Camel Hotel is specially designed to be a "one stop" base for your perfect diving holiday. Our dive center - voted Best Dive Centre Worldwide 2013 - is known as the friendliest in Sharm El Sheikh, and has its own diver training pool. Enjoy our Pomodoro restaurant on-site, relax with a post-dive drink or meal at our famous Camel Bar, or savour our delicious homemade Italian ice-cream at Vanilla cafe. We're located in the heart of Na'ama Bay, just five minutes' walk from the jetty from where dive trips depart. We run daily boat trips to Tiran, Ras Mohammed, Thistlegorm and Million hope wreck excursions, and we offer a complete range of SSI diving lessons. Here we have everything under one roof for your perfect Red Sea diving holiday.

name: Safir Sharm Waterfalls Resort

location: Ras Um El-Sid Plateau, Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: This property is a 9-minute walk from the beach. With a private beach and jetty, this 5-star resort in Sharm El Sheikh features 7 pools and a diving center. Rooms have private balconies overlooking the Red Sea or the gardens. Safir Sharm Waterfalls Resort offers daily animation programs, a health club with a gym and dance classes. For the active, there is a tennis court and a choice of water sports including snorkeling and water skiing. Beauty treatments and shopping can be enjoyed on site of this luxurious hotel. Guests may relax in the sauna, while kids can have fun in the children’s pools or the Kid’s Club. Safir Sharm Waterfalls Resort offers 4 restaurants from traditional Arabian dishes at Paradise Reef that overlooks the main pool to contemporary Italian cuisine at Verdi Bistro. The hotel is 25 minutes' drive from Sharm el Sheikh International Airport and just 4 mi from the town center. Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.2 for a two-person trip.

location: White Knight Beach, 91, Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: This property is a 6-minute walk from the beach. Just a 5-minute walk from Soho Square, Concorde El Salam Sharm El Sheikh offers an outdoor pool, 2 squash courts and 2 equestrian tracks. It also has a private beach access with free transportation. Free WiFi access is available in the hotel lobby. All rooms are fitted with pale wooden furniture and decorated in warm tones. Each one offers a satellite TV, a mini-bar and a balcony or patio. The bathroom is fitted with a bath, a shower and a hairdryer. A wide range of dishes are available at the Italian Restaurant and Waterfalls Restaurant. International cuisines can be enjoyed in Flame Restaurant and Vendome Bar on the beach. There is a piano bar overlooking the pool area and the Normandy II club, offering international music and live shows. At Concorde El Salam Sport Hotel, you will find a fitness center and a spa including sauna, a hot tub and massage treatments. Other facilities offered include a games room, a tour desk and luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including skiing, a water park and billiards. The hotel is 9.9 mi from Naama Bay and Sharm El Sheikh International Airport is 0.6 mi away

description: Unique in the area, Sharks Bay Umbi Diving Village is a friendly, relaxing place that still maintains the feel of how Sharm used to be before the arrival of large scale tourism. The Bedouin owned Diving Village has a well-equipped dive centre, its own private jetty and a fleet of three boats. There is also a seafood restaurant, beach bar and a full range of water sports. The accommodation ranges from wooden Beach Cabins to the individually styled Bedouin Village Rooms which are built into the cliff and have amazing views of the Red Sea and Tiran Island. ……you come as a guest but leave as a friend

location: Om El Seid Hill Hadaba - IL Mercato, Sharm El Sheikh 46619 Egypt
description: IL Mercato is an exclusive five stars city hotel located in Hadaba area, right in the center of IL Mercato Promenade which is home to some of the biggest International brands. With 318 spacious and elegantly furnished guest rooms, large Spa with sauna, massage rooms and Jacuzzi, fitness center and four luxurious swimming pools, fine dining including one main restaurant, one à la carte restaurant, lobby bar and snack bar it provides all the necessary facilities for the most comfortable and enjoyable vacation. La Piazza, in the center of IL Mercato, is the place to meet or take in festivals, concerts and carnivals. Hotel provides free shuttle bus to the most famous beaches from sandy (Terrazzina Beach, White Beach) to open sea beaches ideal for snorkeling & diving experience of the Red Sea (Fanar Beach, Reef Beach, Palma Beach). There is a doctor service available 24 hour, laundry service, Limo Service, Meeting rooms and business services are also available.

name: Verginia Sharm Resort & Aqua Park
description: Персонал ленивый.Уборка за 9 дней не проводилась ни разу.Полы в номере грязные,мыли сами при заселении.Слив в душе практически не работает.обращались с этим 4 раза в различные инстанции управления,результатов ноль.Питание сносное,однообразное.В номерах с видом на бассейн шумно,в дверях щели,очень много комаров.Уезжали почти за сутки до своего срока,заказали сухие завтраки в дорогу,в обед персонал рецепции усиленно кивал головами,к времени отъезда вечером выпучив глаза предлагали обратиться к туроператору,хотя у нас было самостоятельное путешесвие.Даный отель не рекомендую ни кому.

name: Desert View Sharm Hotel
location: El Moteilat Street - Om El Seid Hill, Sharm El Sheikh 99999 Egypt
description: Be careful and stay away from this place. They cheat with prices. We arrived at night and receptionist asked us to pay 85$ per 2 nights with taxes. Even tho I clearly see on my reservation on booking that room for 2 nights costs 35$ without taxes and almost 45$ with taxes. But not 85!!!! How come taxes can be more than 100% from the price?  When I asked receptionist to provide me any information about taxes I have to pay and why the price like that, his reply was “I don’t have internet now, but the price is 100% correct ”.  I used to work on reception too and know everything about taxes on booking so hotel trying to cheat and probably doing that especially with guests who arrive at night…tired, sleepy and don’t have any other choice. I’m super disappointed and first time in my life facing such horrible experience with hotels in Sharm el Sheikh.  Attached pics of my reservation with taxes and without. From where they took 85$ I don’t know…

name: The Rock Hotel Sharm El Sheikh
description: The hotel is very poor. It needs renovation and re-equipment. Equipment is worn out, the furniture is dilapidated, the plumbing is in poor condition. The hotel has a small area, closed from the wind. An excellent pool is the only decoration of the hotel. I can not recommend staying at this hotel for recreation. Only for a short period between travels or excursions or while waiting for a flight home. It makes no sense to book  meals because the food is extremely limited. The hotel staff is very friendly and helpful. However, management overestimates the value of the hotel and is very distant from the desire to work hard over the renovation and reconstruction of the hotel. In my opinion,   necessary financial infusion so that the hotel could keep a level of at least 2 stars. But today the hotel is disappointing.…

In the hotel 8 a la carte restaurants (on the territory of Rixos Premium Seagate), 9 bars, 11 conference rooms, 9 outdoor pools (8 on the territory of Rixos Premium Seagate, 3 heated during the cold season), relaxation zone 18+: Chill Out and 2 swimming pools (1 on the territory of Rixos Premium Seagate), 1 indoor pool (in Lady's SPA, heated during the cold season). Hotel guests have access to the infrastructure of the Rixos Premium Seagate 5 * and Rixos Sharm El Sheikh 5 * (adults only), including restaurants and bars. a restaurant A la Carte restaurant cafe / bar open pool indoor pool heated pool conference hall / banquet hall business center parking car rental safe free wifi elevator laundry hairdresser / beauty salon doctor $ currency exchange ATM payment by payment card For kids Toucan Kids Club for children 0-12 years old, 3 outdoor pools (40 cm deep, heated during the cold season), 6 water slides, Toucan Chef children's restaurant. location: Dusti Rd, Sharm El Sheikh 46619 Egypt
description: Highlights: • Family friendly resort with water slides • Access to 8 à la carte restaurants (unlimited visits) • Family friendly rooms • State-of-the-art meeting rooms • Access to neighboring sister hotel Remal Beach Resort In the middle of Sharm El Sheikh’s scenic landscape and mountains, SUNRISE Remal Resort is an intimate oasis for comfort. The 335 family- friendly rooms at Remal Resort offer all the comfort you need for an unforgettable family vacation at the Red Sea. Every room comes with satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar with soft drinks, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. The resort offers an all- inclusive dine around experience. Enjoy culinary delights in the international restaurant with a daily changing theme buffet or dine at one of the 8 renovated à-la-carte restaurants serving Steak, Egyptian, Mexican, Mediterranean, Indian & Thai cuisine. For seafood lovers, the Resort hosts a Seafood à-la-carte restaurant (chargeable). There is a 24-hour lobby bar, beach & pool bars. It features a fully equipped gym (16+), and a full-serviced spa & beauty salon (chargeable). The large pool area with slides is set to keep you splashing at all times. For those seeking for a tranquil escape, guests have access to a private sandy beach on Ras Nasrani’s beautiful sea. The SUNRISE Kid’s Club led by professional care takers is available for kids between 3-12 years old offering Daily Educational, Entertaining Sports & Activities. Located 10 minutes from Neama Bay City Centre and Sharm El Sheikh International Airport, the hotel offers the perfect balance between desert privacy and exploring the city’s nightlife. Our all-inclusive concept includes: Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner in Buffets or a la carte Restaurants (unlimited reservations), Snacks from 12:00-17:00, 22:30-01:00, local alcoholic Beverages from 10:00-00:00, Water and Hot Beverages 24/7, Minibar with water and soft drinks, Wi-Fi, free entertainment and sports activities, and much more. Some activities/services such as Diving Center, Spa Treatment are extra charge. Please get back to the hotel’s AI Formula for detailed information.

location: 96 A Marsa El Saded South Sinai Governorate, Sharm El Sheikh 46628 Egypt
description: Highlights • The first boho-clubbing resort in Sharm El Sheikh • Adults Only (16+) • Boho-inspired rooms and suites • Premium à-la carte service (à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner) Experience an unmatched atmosphere with the most beautiful natural scenery of the Red Sea at Meraki Resort Sharm El Sheikh (Adults Only). Following the success of the boho clubbing resort Meraki in Hurghada, a second of its kind is now following in Sharm El Sheikh. The resort features an aesthetic, bohemian design, with a set of unmatched, facilities and amenities to enhance your vacation experience. This is a getaway for the wanderers and gypsies with its unconventional décor, minimalistic interiors and natural enticing designs. The hotel hosts 218 spacious Boho rooms and suites with sea, pool and garden views. Meraki hosts unique room types such as Gypster Rooms and Gypster Jacuzzi Room, various suites including Livin’ It Up Jacuzzi Suite, The Party Never Ends Pool/Jacuzzi Suite and Hall of Fame Pool/Jacuzzi Suite. Meraki Resort offers an all-inclusive dine around experience with à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner, including international, Italian and Greek cuisine, as well as the Burger Boulevard and Noodle Tribe Restaurant. Seafood lovers can visit the Seafood à la carte restaurant (chargeable). Meraki’s various bars include; Ophelia Lobby Bar, Floaters Pool Bar, Euphoria Pool Bar, Utopia Beach Bar, Velocity Sports Bar and Carpe Diem Bar. The resort hosts 3 refreshing pools, all of which are heated in the winter. Relish in an exhilarating experience during summer in one of the pools and have a warm stress relief swim during the winter. The hotel overlooks one of the best sandy beaches, where you can have a good dive, enjoy the colorful corals and indulge in the mesmerizing marine life. Have an invigorating stay all year long in Meraki. Live it the bohemian way. Relax and unwind in Meraki Resort’s Spa, offering different treatments crafted to put your body and mind at ease. For the sports enthusiasts, we offer a variety of activities, including the fully equipped gym with the latest machine equipment, training programs and the best trainers. Located 13km from Naama Bay City Center and 10km from Sharm El Sheikh Airport, the resort features a distinctive location.

description: Highlights: • Luxury resort with private beach and coral reef • Futuristic Concept with premium local & imported alcohol • Family-friendly Resort • Swim-up and Jacuzzi Rooms & Suites • 6 à la carte restaurants (unlimited visits when booking all-inclusive) • Royal club privileges upon booking selected suites. Experience extravagance and lavishness at SUNRISE White Hills Resort. With its wondrous realms and novel futuristic concept, the resort is a perfect destination for your next luxury family getaway. White Hills is located at R’as Nasrani, famous for its international diving spots, shallow coral reefs and marine fauna. Being considerate to all preferences with the desire to satisfy all tastes, White Hills hosts a total of 371 rooms and suites differing in the views from a sea view, pool view and garden view. The rooms are categorized into 3 types, Deluxe Room, Deluxe Jacuzzi Room and Deluxe Swim-Up Room. Every room has satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar, tea & coffee making facilities and much more. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort and in all rooms. For guests seeking an extra outstanding experience, White Hills Resort offers Junior Jacuzzi Suites, Family Suites, Executive Pool Suites and an opulent Royal Suite. Experience culinary delights in the international restaurant with a daily changing theme or dine at one of the 5 à-la-carte restaurants serving Asian, Mediterranean, Egyptian, Royal and Fusion Cuisine (included in all-inclusive) and delicacies from the sea at Felucca Seafood restaurant (chargeable). In addition, the resort houses 12 Bars & Cafés including 3 Pool Bars, Beach Bar, Patisserie and Chocolatier Lounge, Pub, Royal Club Lounge, and a 24h Lobby Bar. Whether you’re a pool or a beach fan, White Hills got you covered with its Kids Pool, Oasis Pool, Insula Pool and the sandy beach placed in one of the best spots along the Red Sea Shore and known for its unique diving experience and hypnotizing marine life. The Royal Pool & Royal Jacuzzi Pool with their royal essence will add extra luxury to your stay if you book a suite. Relax and unwind in White Hill’s Spa, offering different treatments crafted to put your body and mind at ease. Of course, we can’t forget our Gymaholic guests, you don’t need to worry about missing your workout programs, our Gym is fully equipped with the latest and the best machines, training programs and the best trainers. The White Hills Kid’s Club led by professional caretakers is available for kids between 3-12 years old offering Daily Educational, Entertaining Sports & Activities. Located 13km (15min) from Naama Bay City Center and 10km (13min) from Sharm El Sheikh Airport, the resort features a distinctive location.

description: Just imagine a holiday spent on Golden beach of Sharm El Shiekh and an evening under the desert stars, BOOK NOW And Feel Our Different Experience! A private, golden sandy beach fringes the all-inclusive Hauza Beach Hotel. Gently swaying palms and the sounds of the waves ebbing at the shore create a delightful ambiance. The location in Nabq Bay overlooking Tiran Island makes this hotel the perfect option for seeing the very best of Sharm El Sheikh. Holiday in style as you make use of resort facilities such as a sea water lagoon, stunning pools, open-air Jacuzzi and safari excursions, sports, dancing, shopping and much more. This is the ideal option for couples and families ensuring the kids have fun in the playground and with activities too. This award winning resort ensures a good time is had by all matched with incredible hospitality, impeccable service and excellent facilities. From morning until night, the choices you encounter make for a thoroughly enjoyable break in this popular Sharm El Sheikh location. The authentic Bedouin atmosphere of the Hauza Beach Resort transports you into the Egyptian charm wherever you are in the resort. A combination of room choices from twin options to queen suites offer superb views and many modern amenities are available to suit each guest’s needs. Plentiful facilities within the resort accommodate sports, shopping, and entertainment, in addition to excellent dining options, and theme nights. Comprehensive resort services are also widely available allowing you to completely relax and enjoy your well-earned break. We would love to see you at Hauza Beach Hotel & Resort and look forward to making you feel at home. Be sure to check out our excellent All-Inclusive plus concept!

All 230 rooms are renovated and designed with comfort and relaxation in mind, reflecting the casual atmosphere. Promising fun and relaxation, resort facilities include two swimming pools, Fitness & Wellness Club. As well as a private beach, which is home to an exciting range of activities, from beach volleyball and diving center and water sports.

name: Club Aloha MariClub
aminities: ,Pool,Bar / lounge,Restaurant,Poolside bar,Beach
description: Just back from 10 days with 3 girl friends and a good time was had by all.  We checked Trip Advisor before we went and thought the reviews maybe too good to be true, but no.  At check in we requested 2 twin rooms with balcony but unfortunately these werent available but they did sort us 2 rooms with terraces which were well located, halfway between main restaurant and pool/beach, so always ask.  Rooms were a little "tired" but very comfortable and clean as were all the other areas, restaurant, pool and beach.  The animation team didnt bother with us about joining in but we presumed this was because we didnt have kids and they were great with the kids. As for the other staff and management we couldnt have asked for more friendly, helpful bunch and at times they were even quite amusing.....Finally the food best I have had in Egypt and I`ve been 5 times, loads of choice and always tasty, great eggs at breakfast oh and the pancakes yum yum. I very rarely return to the same hotel twice BUT we are already planning another visit in October which just about says it all. Great Holiday…

name: Jaz Sharm Dream Hotel Sharm Sharm El-Shaikh
description: למי שרוצה לבוא לשארם  בעיקר לשנרקל.  חזרנו בסוף אוקטובר מחופשת שנירקול בשארם.  להרבה מלונות יש שוניות צמודות, אבל לא רק ביקורות בטריפאדוויזר, אלא גם ובעיקר המיצרים ממליצים על החוף הציבורי  אום אל סיד ועל מלון ג'ז פאנארה Jaz fanara .  במלון אמרו לנו שישראלים נדירים שם. התרשמנו רוב האורחים במלון הם רוסים ואיטלקים. המלון יפה (ביחוד החדרים עם נוף לים), השירות מעולה (גם לפני שחילקנו שטרות של דולר על ימין ושמאל), המסעדה ממש ממש טובה ומגוונת, אבל אלו פרטים קטנים. עיקר החוויה הן השוניות היפיפיות ולהקות הדגים וחיות הים בשלל צבעים שנמתחות מחוף אום אלסיד ועד חוף פארשה הבדואי המקסים. אין לי אומדן כי הייתי רוב הזמן עם הראש במים אבל אני מעריך שזה שנירקול לאורך של כקילומטר (וכמובן אפשר פחות). היינו במלון חמישה ימים וביטלנו תכניות לשוט לטיראן ולנסוע לרס מוחמד (חלק מהשוניות מאוד דומות), כי רצינו להכיל את כל הטוב הזה. כן, אפשר גם לצלול. …

name: Shored Golden Resort
aminities: ,Restaurant,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly)
location: 31 Al Fanar, Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: Отель понравился, хорошая территория! Не плохая еда! Особо понравился мини-клуб. С детьми занимаются опытные педагоги Катюша и Ольга, девочки очень стараются разнообразить отдых как деток, так и взрослых!  Многих родителей это выручает! С детьми делают утреннюю зарядку, детскую йогу, подделки каждый день разные, даже английский для малышей преподают, что очень удивило! Каждый вечер детская дискотека, иногда взрослые не могут усидеть на месте и выбегают танцевать! Одни положительные эмоции! Спасибо!

name: Jaz Mirabel Resort
description: Just arrived back home from the jaz mirabel beach hotel. Location is quiet and taxis are needed to visit soho square and the strip .  Hotel gardens, pools, snack bars etc are perfect . Rooms are basic with good air con, basic but have everything you need. Beach is beautiful and coral has been removed to make it easy to walk into the sea, very shallow but lovely, Sadly the jetty/pier is not useable, however a little walk and you reach the sister hotels jetty that you can use for snorkelling. Food was ok, nothing amazing but you won’t go hungry. Staff are amazing, attentive, happy, helpful and very polite. Entertainment was ok, the animation team try so hard and work extremely hard to please everyone, The party on the beach is worth a visit. Recommend the snorkelling day trip, great snorkelling and amazing food on the boat. Kareem the night hotel receptionist was great and very helpful. All in all a very nice hotel and a lovely holiday, My personal preference would be to have more amenities in walking distance, bars restaurants etc but this is my preference and nothing to do with the hotel. Highly recommend this hotel and would return.…

name: Garden Reef Resort
description: Если вы едете в этот отель - будьте готовы к соотношению цена\качество. Отель дешевый, и обслуживание соответствует. Хамовитый персонал, очереди в столовке (назвать это рестораном язык не повернется). Бассейны грязные, стремноватые, хлоркой воняют. Зачем их закрывают в 17.00 - загадка, ни разу не видела, чтоб их чистили. Кофе в столовке - помои без всяких переносных смыслов. За грилем нужно стоять в очереди. Бывают фрукты, неплохие. Территория красивая. Выглядят бассейны шикарно (днем, ночью их не подсвечивают). Мест для фотографирования куча. Отдельно могу сказать о пляже и море. Невзирая на мелочи в виде  поломанного понтона, море шикарное. Пляж находится в небольшой бухте, благодаря этому красный флаг почти не поднимали, купайся сколько угодно. Глубина небольшая, рыбок много,  от понтона протянуты веревки - очень удобно. Ехать туда можно только ради моря. На пляже обслуживание тоже отвратительное, перекусы выглядят противно - кусок теста, на нем клякса томатной пасты, и 3 соломинки картошки. Пиво теплое, то нема, то нету. Публика в отеле соотвествующая - чисто СНГ, немного арабов. Я очень общительный человек, но тут ни с кем не хотелось даже разговаривать - кроме семьи беларусов и грузин. Мой вывод: лучше не экономить настолько. Еще 100 баксов к путевке - и отдыхаешь, как человек. А анимация хорошая! Единственное, что было смешно и мило.…

name: Le Royale
description: This is the third year I have visited this hotel. This year I was incredibly disappointed that standards had dropped so much. The room although large and reasonably well appointed was not cleaned properly. I was also regularly not supplied with water in the room which I had to collect myself from reception. The grounds had a strange 'sewer' odor at certain times of the day. Food was bland and much the same each day. Tables and chairs in the restaurants were not cleaned properly and were simply dirty. I witnessed one child throwing up on the food court floor. This was wiped with a mop using no water or disinfectant. The mop was taken straight back into the kitchen. Service was thin on the ground and inadequate. Having returned three times it's disappointing to say I will never return to this hotel. Wifi didnt work properly.…

location: El Forouseya St., Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: I was booked in with my family to stay for one night after a late trip from Israel back to Egypt. I have never seen anything like it. The reception was filthy; dirty curtains, broken lights, dirty toilets, no toilet tissue or hand towels. The room had broken lights a broken sink, dirty sheets, no towels, exposed wires in the bathroom and water coming through the floor.  When we showed the young man on reception his response was “It’s for one night” we spoke to the manager whose attitude was even worse.  We found a hotel that was clean and had professional staff 5 minutes down the road. This hotel needs to be closed down I wouldn’t put an animal in this hotel.

name: Domina Aquamarine Hotel & Resort
description: My parents visited sharm for first time and I booked for them Domina for 5 days. As my parents first time out of their country, they enjoyed so much.  The big plug of the hotel - sea, beach, wellness zone, not bad food. One of the best place to make snorkeling.  From my side I would say big thanks for Mr Mahmoud sales manager, who met us and gave full welcoming, hospitality and respect. For Mr. Mohamed Shahat for his great staff and his great job. Also I would mention the reception staff - so patient and everything organized.  The big minus of the hotel concierge service - which give bad impression about the hotel; staff around the hotel, who doesn’t give service, don’t know any English word. No any information about bus, how to move around the hotel as the territory is too big.  Also paper cups, even at the main restaurant. Rooms a dated. The entertainment team do not engage with the guests at all, but evening shows are nice.  However the hotel is very nice. The credit of the hotel is beach and sea. Also amazing wellness zone and SPA.…

aminities: ,Hot bath,Outdoor pool,Fitness Centre with Gym / Workout Room,Bar / lounge,Restaurant,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Spa,Laundry service,Air conditioning,Housekeeping,Room service
location: Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: I have wanted to come here for years and was excited but …… oh boy when I visited here and cried on my first night as I just couldn’t believe it.  I asked if I could change rooms on my first night and was refused.  When I arrived I went down to dinner and was appalled by what I saw.  SLOP AFTER SLOP.  After a couple of days I was going to move hotels but it would’ve cost me an extra £1000 .  I’d already paid around £1000 for this so called 4 star hotel.  They did change my room but well to be honest it was still not great.    There were no hangers for my clothes in the first room either.  I have even come home early.  I asked reception when easyjet call can they come and get me I’ll be by the pool. They’re response was UNBELIEVABLE they don’t have a phone only email!!!!!   I know this is rubbish.   I have been ripped off by people that work there left right and centre.  I WILL NEVER GO BACK.  It’s left me feeling really depressed.  One guest changed his room 4 times!!!  I work really hard for my money and don’t get paid a lot as I work in care.    I’m feeling EXTREMELY DEPRESSED.…
