location: Nabq Bay, Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: Very a mazing hotel. Has a nice view for all rooms. The team very friendly and helpful. The food is very delicious and various to suit all people. All inclusive every one can have soft or alcohol drinks in any time. And at 11 am the time on cafes around the pools for burger and chips. Every Tuesday there  is a special party in a mazing place oriental dancing and tamura. Every Thursday it's the Egyptian day on food and traditional sweets also special party on beach. Rooms are very clean with pool view and some rooms have its private pool. Really I spent 8 days in this hotel with my family and not feeling bored at all bcs when you go to the beach a lot of water activities you can do such as diving,speeding boat and many other activities. I encourage every one who need healthy food and relaxation with family or beloved to go to this hotel. Another important issue is all markets and shopping areas are very very closed just less than 10 minutes walking for metro market and hard rock cafe, and other entertainment areas for all members of family.thanks a lot for all team and good management in…

name: Sea Life Resort
location: 2 Nabq Bay, Sharm El Sheikh 11371 Egypt
description: Resort molto curato esternamente e ampio, è presente tanto personale che si occupa dell’esterno e del verde. Il cibo è buono, con tanta scelta. Il personale è gentile, ci ha fatto sentire a casa. Show serali dell’animazione ben fatti e divertenti. L’animazione ottima, italiana e internazionale, simpaticissima e ti coinvolgono in tutte le attività. Torneremo.

name: La Sirena Sharm El Sheikh Resort
description: This was an individual booking, whilst in Sharm el sheikh hadaba. I needed accomodation fast. Room, balcony and shower room were clean and a very good price. Breakfast was included. Pool areas were very well maintained and there was a small pool and some entertainment for children at night in the second pool.  I would like to stress that the pool attendant was very observant checking visually and verbally if everyone entering the deep pool could swim. He also  was certificated for life saving. All staff were very friendly and efficient even though they were under staffed. I would definitely stay there again The Hotel is situated in hadaba close to the AAIB Bank, shopping centre and a 30 min. Walk to the old market and restaurants. Some local Egyptian restaurants can be found in the back streets in hadaba .not posh but good tasty food at a very good price…

name: Sharm Holidays Real Estate
description: Я приехала на неделю, а осталась на месяц. Очень хорошее надёжное агентство. Чудесная и комфортная квартира. Чисто, все необходимое есть. Можно готовить кушать, есть плита и холодильник. Отличное расположен, рядом есть все что нужно для жизни и отдыха! Работники агентства очень дружелюбные и порядочные, всегда помогут! Всём советую!

name: HI Sharm El Sheikh
aminities: ,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly)
location: Hadabet om Elsayed, Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: The hotel was of a good standard and the Hotel staff were very helpful all round , It would be ideal for anyone who just wants to chill out !! The 2 hotel staff  that impressed me the most were Samuel who was an exceptional Bar Manager and Karem front desk who went way beyond the call of service in getting my mobile phone back from a dubious phone shop called Sim Card on the square.      Even though Egypt is not my sort of place I would not have any problem going back to the Iberotel !!                                                                 William Ollis

name: Private Apartments in Delta Sharm
aminities: ,Parking,Pool,Fitness Centre with Gym / Workout Room,Bar / lounge,Diving,Horseback riding,Pets Allowed ( Dog / Pet Friendly ),Airport transportation,Sauna,Restaurant,Tennis court,Table tennis,Shuttle bus service,Car hire,Spa,Massage,Steam room,Dry cleaning,Laundry service,Room service,Family rooms
location: 202-100 Delta Sharm Resort, Sharm El Sheikh 55555 Egypt
description: Arrived here after a 14 hour drive from Luxor and very tired,  We were then shown into what could be loosely called a 'Reception Area. Behind the desk sat a disinterested man not polite enough to shake our hands.  I noticed several piles of dirty laundry.  When we were taken to our apartment  I noticed a pool with no water surrounded by unkempt gardens.  We were then taken up a rickety old wood stair to the apartment which contained a very old and dirty sofa. The fridge was in the living area and the door handle was untouchable due to the dirty marks and dried on food. The inside had not been cleaned.Next the kitchen...an apartment for 2 had 1 glass,  2 chipped dinner size plates, a greasy frying pan and a pot used for deep frying which was covered in grease on the outside.  The cooker was a dirty greasy 2 ring job with deep scorch marks on either side on the formica,A microwave onto which was burned on food and filthy.  Next the bathroom, No towels or toilet rolls that were included in 'equipment supplied' The shower tray was engrained with dirt and had no curtain. The bedroom...dirty pillows, an unironed sheet and a top cover which was torn in many places.  No hangers...just dust in the wardrobes. Th e balcony contained a square, scratched and stained wood table, 1 wicker chair and an upright (dining table type chair).All in all a filthy disgusting place which I would not put a rat in...although there was probably a family living there. We returned to the 'reception' and demanded a refund of the 1200LE we had paid for 3 night.  We were told a 'nice" apartment available at 9 pm if we stayed in the original one until then.  We couldn't wait to get out of the place quick a enough…

name: Sandy Hotel
aminities: ,Free parking,Free High Speed Internet (WiFi),Pool,Free breakfast,Pets Allowed ( Dog / Pet Friendly ),Currency exchange,Non-smoking hotel,24-hour front desk,Parking,Wifi,Restaurant,ATM on site,Laundry service,Air conditioning,Seating area,Telephone,Minibar,Refrigerator,Bath / shower,Non-smoking rooms

description: Situated at the heart Sharm El Sheikh’s shopping district "Old Market", Sandy Hotel offers affordable rooms, outdoor swimming pool and complimentary Wi-Fi and parking. It is a short walk to Terrazina Beach.Fitted with air conditioning, satellite TV and a mini bar, each room is decorated with simplistic furnishings.The hotel is less than 10 minutes’ drive from Naama Bay.

name: Criss Resort
aminities: ,Free parking,Pool,Kitchenette
location: 1 El Salam Road, Sharm El Sheikh 069 Egypt
description: We are self catering apartments located in the heart of Neema Bay - Sharm el Sheikh. Our 1 and 2 bedroom apartments all include fully equipped kitchen with gas stove/oven, large fridge, automatic washing machine, air conditioning in every room, satellite TV, balconies, fantastic view of mountains or swimming pool. They have linen, beach and normal towels provided, private bathroom. We are walking distance to the beach, banks, supermarkets, transport and nightlife.

name: Royal Oasis Resort
aminities: ,Pool,Outdoor pool,Fitness Centre with Gym / Workout Room,Restaurant,Breakfast buffet,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Laundry service,Air conditioning,Kitchenette
location: 39 Halomy Street, Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: We visited this hotel in Feb 2014. It has to be the worst hotel we have ever stayed in to date.   We checked in and was gave a room that was supposedly the best room. The room looked like it hadn't been cleaned for years,  the room was filled with dust, the curtains where dirty and half hanging off, the bed sheets where old, dirty and had little bubbles all over like it had been used over a million times. There was rubbish left on our bathroom floor which included bits of fruit?? The shower head had mould and the shower was extremely dirty.  The hotel is placed on top of steep hill. The man made stairs will take you straight down to naama bay but be careful as if you miss a step, you will drop and severely injure yourself or possible death. At night there are no lights on the stairs so it's extremely hard to climb the stairs in the dark as it's stairs that are made up of mud.  The pool was GREEN, not blue and it looked like he hadn't been cleaned for months.  The only night we stayed, our room neighbours partied all night in front of the pool until around 6am. There was screaming, shouting and loud music for the whole night. If we opened our curtains, the people outside could directly see into our room.   We had booked at 7 night stay but after the first night we wanted to check out. The hotel caused a fuss when we did want to check out as we told them the problem with the room - they told us we wasn't allowed to check out and we need to contact our holiday rep. Our holiday rep did not leave any contact details so we couldn't contact him. The hotel had no details of the holiday rep either so they insisted we needed to stay. They tried to force us to stay but we didn't want too.   The room has no wifi connection so the next morning we went to the Starbucks in naama bay and jumped onto booking.com and booked at a hotel we have previously stayed at - Falcon Naama Star Hotel.   Upon leaving the hotel, the service desk refused to check us out again suggesting that it was necessary to stay. We told them that they cannot force us to stay and we are leaving and they can't stop us. We took our bags to the stair case where they had security. Yet AGAIN the security guards tried to stop us from leaving saying we are not allowed to check out until our holiday was over. We told them if they don't let us go we will have to report them.   Please do not stay at this hotel, we was made to feel like we wasn't allowed to leave with the hotel forcing us to stay.   Save yourself the hassle and book else where. We did not once regret leaving this hotel.  …

name: Old New Tiran Village

name: Regency Lodge Sharm Hotel
location: Magles El Madina St. Umm El Sid Hill, Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: This is literally the worst place ever to stay. I would not recommend it to anyone. The place is very dirty, the rooms are so tiny and unclean we found insects everywhere. The kitchen staff are so rude and the food is horrible we got sick. The chef handling the buffet is very unprofessional and impolite. He served very little portion of food and did not want people to add more to their plates even though it was an open buffet. This is the last place i would stay at when i come again.   هذا هو حرفيا أسوأ مكان للإقامة على الإطلاق. لن أوصي به لأي شخص. المكان قذر جدا، الغرف صغيرة جدا وغير نظيفة ووجدنا الحشرات في كل مكان. موظفو المطبخ وقحون جدا والطعام فظيع لقد مرضنا. الشيف الذي يتعامل مع البوفيه غير مهني وغير مهذب للغاية. كان يقدم جزءا صغيرا جدا من الطعام ولم يرغب في أن يضيف الناس المزيد إلى أطباقهم على الرغم من أنه كان بوفيه مفتوحا. هذا هو آخر مكان سأقيم فيه عندما آتي مرة أخرى…

description: El Kheima Beach Resort Established 1987 developed 2008 to be one of the first to be built and the last to be develoesd to be opened 2011. Bordered by the picturesque Sharm El Maya Bay, perched 1.2-6.8 Meter high above the sea, sits our peaceful retreat on 35000 m2 of land with only 20% built area with a soothing 225m of a clear sea view and 13000 m2 of a private sandy beach with an extensive range of on-site exciting water sports and leisure facilities. Experience the charm of Sharm at El Kheima Beach Resort and its various offerings. The natural wonders and man-made pleasures will never be forgotten. Treat yourself to a true temperate paradise with its unique location in the heart of Sharm El Maya.

name: Herrmes Hotel Suites
location: Delta Sharm Resort 102-182, Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: If you are in Sharm El Sheikh so you need to stay here best place to stay with cozy clean room and perfect pool and speedy WiFi , polite staff with super professional owner MR.Ibrahim he will do anything to be sure you're happy All rooms in front of swimming pool and amazing cozy coffee area and intercontinental breakfast, nothing here to complain , I traveled a lot and really this place one of best stay around the world specially if you need peace and relaxing Thanks Ibrahim you're a such great person ...

Немаловажный аспект - тихо! Замечательный персонал - менеджеры подбирали нам номера попросторнее и даже помогли найти человека, меняющего на фунты рубли, что для Шарма большая редкость.

name: Nabq Mona Beach Resoert
location: Nabq Zone Mona Beach, Sharm El Sheikh 46627 Egypt
description: اول ما وصلنا روحنا اخر الدنيا القرية مرمية ف مكان بعييييد يعتبر صحراء لوحده مالوش علاقه بشرم الشيخ نهائي .. دخلنا لاقينا الحجز ملغي مع انهم باعتين لينا ايميل و عملنا كونفيرم و الدنيا كانت تمام  قالولنا السيستم كان وقع وقت الحجز واتلغبط مع حجز ناس تانية .. جابولنا بعد شوية مفتاح شقة في  D20  بتاعه شخص ما اسمه هشام  دخلنا الشقه لاقيناها مش نضيفه ومحتاجة تنضيف طبعا مش مستعدين لاستقبال حد فيها اصلا .. نضفتها وبدأت اكتشف أن الكاتيل مش شغال و البوتاجاز الأنبوبة بتاعته فاضية والمطلوب مني اشحن كهربا و اجيب أنبوبة علي حسابي وانا طالعه يومين بس !! و دافعه ١٠٠٠ جنيه رايحه اصرف كمان ع الشقه نزلنا الساعه ٨ لاقينا الدنيا ضلمه جدا حتي البيسين مقفول و مضلمين كل حاجة يعني حتي مالكش الحق تقعد ع البيسين ولا في مطاعم ولا اي حاجة خالص  رجعنا اتصلنا بالاستاذ هشام صاحب الشقة وقولناله مش هانقدر نكمل يومين كدة قالنا شوية وهارد عليكوا ولحد الساعه ١٠ ونص ماردش علينا اضطرينا ندخل نلغي الحجز من علي بوكينج عشان نلحق نحجز ف مكان تاني  لاقينا الاستاذ المحترم بيتصل ييتخانق معانا و قولناله هانقضي الليله دي وهانسيبلك حسابها مع السيكيوريتي عشان مانرضالكش الخسارة وخصوصاً اننا هانبات ليله و ده حقك من غير مايسمع ولا يركز ف اللي اتقال ده قام قافل السكه ولاقيناه باعتلنا السيكيوريتي وعايزنا نمشي من الشقه بمنتهى قلة الذوق  دخلنا السيكيورتى الشقه ووريناله البوتاجاز اللي مش شغال ولا الكاتيل ومعانا طفلة سنتين مش عارفين نأكلها ولا نشربها و مافيش مطاعم ولا حياة ف المكان اصلا وقولناله هانسيبلك ايجار الليله مطلوب مننا ايه تاني ؟! وهو قفل السكه ومارضيش يسمع السيكيوريتي اقتنع بكلامنا وقال هايحاول يتفق معاه وفعلا بعد شوية خبط علينا وقالنا أنه وافق بس هايزود ٣٥ دولار طبعا رفضنا ومشينا الساعه ١٢ بليل  حسبي الله ونعم الوكيل فيه و في كل واحد نصاب ومستغل بالشكل ده…

name: Delta Sharm Apartments
aminities: ,Hot bath,Restaurant,Children Activities (Kid / Family Friendly),Laundry service
location: El Salam Road, Sharm El Sheikh Egypt
description: I came for a family holiday to sharm el sheikh, now that us British are allowed to go, we stayed at delta sharm to which my grievance is not particularly with. A warning to all English travellers, British people are being targeted by everyone here, we have been ripped off at every and any opportunity the Egyptians have, we have even been targeted by a very clever gang and robbed, I have been here many times in the past and know the place well and know how things work, and I can now say I will NEVER return.  STAY AWAY for your own good, they say welcome back, good to see English back here then go out of their way to rob you.
